resources.string: No spendable standard outputs for %s have found
Requested amount is bigger than available balance minus fee.
Generated transaction have suspiciously big fee. Please report to developer.
Fee is greater than available balance.
Output address is same as input address - it\'s likely a mistake.
Error creating transaction - for some unknown reason generated transaction contained an error.
Transaction below will transfer %1$s BCH from %2$s to %3$s. Transaction fee is %4$s BCH.
Transaction below will transfer %1$s BTC from %2$s to %3$s. Transaction fee is %4$s BTC.
Transaction below will transfer %1$s BCH from %2$s to %3$s. Transaction fee is %4$s BCH. Change of %5$s BCH will go to %2$s.
Transaction below will transfer %1$s BTC from %2$s to %3$s. Transaction fee is %4$s BTC. Change of %5$s BTC will go to %2$s.
